tool.name: Tribal_AOI_Maps_Tables

param.name: eSTIP_tribal_consultation
param.displayname: eSTIP List for Tribal Consultation (Excel File)
param.dialogReference:
Excel sheet containing eSTIP projects to be mapped. This file must have a sheet named 'eSTIP Filtered' and must have columns named 'Route', 'BOP', 'EOP', and 'Length (Miles)'. The tool creates a temporary Excel file, which is deleted at the end, to perform the following operations:

  1. Route values are altered so that they have the correct syntax for adding them to NMDOT's linear reference system (e.g. NM-4-P)

  2. Records where route is blank are omitted

  3. The 'Length (Miles)' column is renamed to 'Length'

param.name: output_location
param.dialogReference: This is the location where you want to save the output from this tool.

param.name: map_note
param.displayname: Map Note Text (placed at map bottom)
param.dialogReference: Enter the map note (if any) you want to be added at the bottom left hand corner of the map.

param.name: season
param.dialogReference: Choose the season to append to the map's title (year is added automatically using the current year).

tool.summary: This tool creates tribal consultation area of interest (AOI) maps for all tribes which NMDOT Environment consults regarding projects with ground disturbance potentital. The only input for the tool is a filtered eSTIP Excel file that must have a sheet name titled 'eSTIP Filtered' containing STIP projects to be mapped. The tool adds the STIP projects to NMDOT's LRS as lines or points depending on project length (1000 ft is the demarcation), zooms to each AOI, and converts all labels to annotation so that annotation can be moved below the county mask prior to exporting separate PDF maps for all 33 tribes. The tool provides the user control of specifying output location for the maps, control of changing the map notes placed at the bottom of the map, & season text that is appended to the map title. The tool also exports a separate Excel file for each tribe containing the projects (if any) that are within the tribe's AOI.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool creates tribal consultation area of interest (AOI) maps for all tribes which NMDOT Environment consults regarding projects with ground disturbance potentital. The only input for the tool is a filtered eSTIP Excel file that must have a sheet name titled 'eSTIP Filtered' containing STIP projects to be mapped. The tool adds the STIP projects to NMDOT's LRS as lines or points depending on project length (1000 ft is the demarcation), zooms to each AOI, and converts all labels to annotation so that annotation can be moved below the county mask prior to exporting separate PDF maps for all 33 tribes. The tool provides the user control of specifying output location for the maps, control of changing the map notes placed at the bottom of the map, & season text that is appended to the map title. The tool also exports a separate Excel file for each tribe containing the projects (if any) that are within the tribe's AOI.

Consts.useLimit: This tool requires Pandas 0.23, as well as xlsxwriter 1.0.5 to run.
